My name is Ted and I’m a front end developer

About

To constantly improve my knowledge, learn new ideas and perfecting my tools is something that certanly rings true to me. Having all the knowledge that I need to be able to create basically anything I want is my biggest motivation.

And, when I’m not coding websites or making games, I love getting outdoors, grabbing a beer with some friends or just play some games.
